faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our Charlie and Lola style character transformation service.

items.title: What is Charlie and Lola Style Converter?
items.description: Charlie and Lola Style Converter is a magical AI transformation service that turns any photo into charming characters inspired by Lauren Child's beloved children's books. Using advanced Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview technology, we perfectly capture the series' distinctive art style.

items.title: How is this different from other character generators?
items.description: We specialize exclusively in the authentic Charlie and Lola art style, capturing Lauren Child's distinctive thin sketchy outlines, flat colors, and whimsical character proportions. Our AI is trained specifically for this beloved children's book aesthetic.

items.title: What can I create with this service?
items.description: Transform family photos, children's portraits, special occasion pictures, or any photo into delightful Charlie and Lola style characters. Perfect for custom storybooks, nursery decor, educational materials, gifts, and magical keepsakes.

items.title: How long does the transformation take?
items.description: Character transformations typically complete within 30-60 seconds using our advanced Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview technology. Simply upload your photo and watch the Charlie and Lola magic happen!

items.title: How authentic is the Charlie and Lola style?
items.description: Our AI has been specifically trained to capture Lauren Child's distinctive illustration style from the beloved Charlie and Lola books, including the signature sketchy lines, flat colors, childlike proportions, and whimsical charm that makes these characters so special.

items.title: Can I use the character images I create?
items.description: Yes! The Charlie and Lola style character images you create are yours to use for personal purposes, gifts, family keepsakes, educational materials, and non-commercial projects. Perfect for printing, sharing, and creating magical memories.
